ActJudges Act
SubjectGranting of leave of absence to the Hon. Richard G. Mongeau
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. RICHARD G. MONGEAU, a judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, from September 1, 2011 to January 31, 2012, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
